paragraph.heading:
Podalonia chalybea (
KOHL 1906
)
(compared with the type det. Kohl, NHMW) 469, 149

subSubSection.paragraph: N o t e:51 have an abdomen basally dark-reddish and not completely bluish-black as usual and 127 and 9 are stylopized.
